ModMetaData.name: [SR]Raid Extension (fork)
ModMetaData.author: Shadowrabbit
llunak
ModMetaData.description: 4 new incidents have been added to this mod. These events expand the ways in which hostile factions interact with colonists, making them not limited to the form of raids. This is a fork of https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2554928098 , with changes from https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3220647134 incorporated.
